languages.text: "Говори за себя и за свой клан, а я буду говорить за свой. Не хочу подачек — настоящих изменений хочу. А то сейчас нам пообещают всякого, а как только светлолик{mf|ий|ая} отвернется, эти твари на нас напустятся пуще прежнего. За то, что вякнуть посмели!"

"You speak for yourself and your clan, and I'll speak for me and mine. I don't want empty gestures — I want real change. They'll promise us the world now, but as soon as the anointed one turns {mf|his|her} back, these brutes will be on us even harder than before. All because we dared to speak out!"
languages.original_text: "Говори за себя и за свой клан, а я буду говорить за свой. Не хочу подачек — настоящих изменений хочу. А то сейчас нам пообещают всякого, а как только светлолик{mf|ий|ая} отвернется, эти твари на нас напустятся пуще прежнего. За то, что вякнуть посмели!"

They'll promise us the world now, but as soon as the anointed one turns {mf|his|her} back, these brutes will be on us even harder than before. All because we dared to speak out!"

traits.locale_text: "You speak for yourself and your clan, and I'll speak for me and mine. I don't want empty gestures — I want real change. They'll promise us the world now, but as soon as the anointed one turns {mf|his|her} back, these brutes will be on us even harder than before. All because we dared to speak out!"
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderOld

languages.text: “你想为你自己和你的氏族说话，但我也想为我自己和我的氏族说话。我不想要空头支票，我想要真正的改变。他们现在尽可以跟我们说得天花烂坠，但只要舰长大人{mf|他|她}一回头，这群畜生只会比以前下手更黑，因为我们敢站出来说出真相！”
languages.original_text: "You speak for yourself and your clan, and I'll speak for me and mine. I don't want empty gestures — I want real change. They'll promise us the world now, but as soon as the anointed one turns {mf|his|her} back, these brutes will be on us even harder than before. All because we dared to speak out!"

traits.locale_text: “你想为你自己和你的氏族说话，但我也想为我自己和我的氏族说话。我不想要空头支票，我想要真正的改变。他们现在尽可以跟我们说得天花烂坠，但只要舰长大人{mf|他|她}一回头，这群畜生只会比以前下手更黑，因为我们敢站出来说出真相！”
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderOld

languages.text: «Habla por ti y por tu clan, que yo haré lo mismo. No quiero gestos vacíos, quiero cambios de verdad. Ahora pueden prometernos todo lo que queremos, pero, en cuanto {mf|el|la} elegid{mf|o|a} se dé la vuelta, estos brutos abusarán aún más de nosotros, ¡por haber tenido la osadía de quejarnos!».
languages.original_text: "You speak for yourself and your clan, and I'll speak for me and mine. I don't want empty gestures — I want real change. They'll promise us the world now, but as soon as the anointed one turns {mf|his|her} back, these brutes will be on us even harder than before. All because we dared to speak out!"

traits.locale_text: «Habla por ti y por tu clan, que yo haré lo mismo. No quiero gestos vacíos, quiero cambios de verdad. Ahora pueden prometernos todo lo que queremos, pero, en cuanto {mf|el|la} elegid{mf|o|a} se dé la vuelta, estos brutos abusarán aún más de nosotros, ¡por haber tenido la osadía de quejarnos!».
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderOld

languages.text: 「あんたはアンタ自身と自分の一族のために話な。あたしもそうする。虚しいうわべだけのことはどうでもいいんだ…あたしは本当の変化がほしいのさ。連中はあたしらにとりあえずの約束をするだろうけど、ロード・キャプテン様がいなくなれば、また厳しくあたしらに襲いかかるだろうさ。すべて、あたしらが声を上げたせいでね！」
languages.original_text: "You speak for yourself and your clan, and I'll speak for me and mine. I don't want empty gestures — I want real change. They'll promise us the world now, but as soon as the anointed one turns {mf|his|her} back, these brutes will be on us even harder than before. All because we dared to speak out!"

traits.locale_text: 「あんたはアンタ自身と自分の一族のために話な。あたしもそうする。虚しいうわべだけのことはどうでもいいんだ…あたしは本当の変化がほしいのさ。連中はあたしらにとりあえずの約束をするだろうけど、ロード・キャプテン様がいなくなれば、また厳しくあたしらに襲いかかるだろうさ。すべて、あたしらが声を上げたせいでね！」
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderOld

languages.text: "Ihr sprecht für Euch und Euren Clan, ich spreche für mich und meinen. Ich will keine leeren Gesten. Ich will echte Veränderung. Sie versprechen uns die Welt, aber sobald uns {mf|der|die} Gesalbte den Rücken zukehrt, tyrannisieren uns diese Schläger schlimmer als je zuvor. Und das nur, weil wir es gewagt haben, den Mund aufzumachen!"
languages.original_text: "You speak for yourself and your clan, and I'll speak for me and mine. I don't want empty gestures — I want real change. They'll promise us the world now, but as soon as the anointed one turns {mf|his|her} back, these brutes will be on us even harder than before. All because we dared to speak out!"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr sprecht für Euch und Euren Clan, ich spreche für mich und meinen. Ich will keine leeren Gesten. Ich will echte Veränderung. Sie versprechen uns die Welt, aber sobald uns {mf|der|die} Gesalbte den Rücken zukehrt, tyrannisieren uns diese Schläger schlimmer als je zuvor. Und das nur, weil wir es gewagt haben, den Mund aufzumachen!"
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderOld

languages.text: « Libre à toi de parler au nom de ton clan, tant que tu me laisses parler au nom du mien. Pour ma part, je ne veux pas de gestes symboliques, mais un vrai changement. Ils sont prêts à nous promettre monts et merveilles pour calmer le jeu dans l'immédiat, mais dès que Sa Seigneurie ici présente aura tourné le dos, ses gorilles nous tomberont dessus à bras raccourci, tout ça parce qu'on aura eu le malheur l'ouvrir ! »
languages.original_text: "You speak for yourself and your clan, and I'll speak for me and mine. I don't want empty gestures — I want real change. They'll promise us the world now, but as soon as the anointed one turns {mf|his|her} back, these brutes will be on us even harder than before. All because we dared to speak out!"

traits.locale_text: « Libre à toi de parler au nom de ton clan, tant que tu me laisses parler au nom du mien. Pour ma part, je ne veux pas de gestes symboliques, mais un vrai changement. Ils sont prêts à nous promettre monts et merveilles pour calmer le jeu dans l'immédiat, mais dès que Sa Seigneurie ici présente aura tourné le dos, ses gorilles nous tomberont dessus à bras raccourci, tout ça parce qu'on aura eu le malheur l'ouvrir ! »
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderOld

languages.text: "Sen kendi klanın adına konuşuyorsan ben de kendiminki adına konuşuyorum. Boş vaatlere karnımız tok, artık bir şeylerin değişmesi lazım. Şimdi dünyaları vadedecekler ama vekil hazretleri bakmazken tepemize binecekler. Sırf konuşmaya cüret ettik diye eskisinden beter olacağız!"
languages.original_text: "You speak for yourself and your clan, and I'll speak for me and mine. I don't want empty gestures — I want real change. They'll promise us the world now, but as soon as the anointed one turns {mf|his|her} back, these brutes will be on us even harder than before. All because we dared to speak out!"

traits.locale_text: "Sen kendi klanın adına konuşuyorsan ben de kendiminki adına konuşuyorum. Boş vaatlere karnımız tok, artık bir şeylerin değişmesi lazım. Şimdi dünyaları vadedecekler ama vekil hazretleri bakmazken tepemize binecekler. Sırf konuşmaya cüret ettik diye eskisinden beter olacağız!"
